org.linqs.psl.model.rule.logical

Class AbstractLogicalRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.model.rule.AbstractRule
      • org.linqs.psl.model.rule.logical.AbstractLogicalRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, AtomEvent.Listener, Rule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnweightedLogicalRule, WeightedLogicalRule

    public abstract class AbstractLogicalRule
extends AbstractRule
    Base class for all (first order, i.e., not ground) logical rules.

    • Method Detail

      • groundAll

        public void groundAll(AtomManager atomManager,
                      GroundRuleStore grs)
        Description copied from interface: Rule
        Adds all missing, potentially unsatisfied GroundRules to a GroundRuleStore based on an AtomManager.

        Specifically, will add any GroundRule templated by this Rule that satisfies all the following conditions:

        • The GroundRule has incompatibility or infeasibility greater than NumericUtilities.strictEpsilon for some assignment of truth values to the RandomVariableAtoms currently persisted in the AtomManager's Database given the truth values of the ObservedAtoms and assuming that any RandomVariableAtom not persisted has a truth value of 0.0.
        • The GroundRule is not already in the GroundRuleStore.
        • If the GroundRule is a WeightedGroundRule, its incompatibility is not constant with respect to the truth values of RandomVariableAtoms (including those not persisted in the AtomManager's Database).

        Only GroundRules which satisfy these conditions should be added.

        Parameters:
        atomManager - AtomManager on which to base the grounding
        grs - store for new GroundRules
        See Also:
        WeightedGroundRule.getIncompatibility(), UnweightedGroundRule.getInfeasibility()

      • notifyAtomEvent

        public void notifyAtomEvent(AtomEvent event,
                            GroundRuleStore grs)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRule
        Handles an AtomEvent using the specified GroundRuleStore.

        Rules need to have registered to handle this event with an AtomEventFramework.

        Specified by:
        notifyAtomEvent in class AbstractRule
        Parameters:
        event - the AtomEvent that occurred
        grs - the GroundRuleStore to use

      • registerForAtomEvents

        public void registerForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework manager)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRule
        Registers with a specific AtomEventFramework to handle atom events.

        Subclasses are expected to register for the same AtomEvents and Predicates at all times. Rules that do not fit this behavior should not extend this class.

        Specified by:
        registerForAtomEvents in class AbstractRule
        Parameters:
        manager - The event framework to register with

      • unregisterForAtomEvents

        public void unregisterForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework manager)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRule
        Unregisters from a specific AtomEventFrameWork to no longer handle atom events.

        Subclasses are expected to have registered for the same AtomEvents and Predicates at all times. Rules that do not fit this behavior should not extend this class.

        Specified by:
        unregisterForAtomEvents in class AbstractRule
        Parameters:
        manager - The event framework to unregister from
